```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
attach(nycflights)
nycflights<-nycflights
nycflights
```

##Filter

###Filter allows you to subset observations based on their values
```{r}
filter(nycflights, month==1, day==1)
```

###If you want to save the filtering result, assign to a variable
```{r}
jan1<-filter(nycflights, month==1, day==1)
```
